actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Rail Passenger Service Act of 1970 in order to require that before the National Railroad Passenger Corporation changes any schedule of, or increases any rate, fare, or charge for, rail passenger service, the Corporation shall hold a public hearing and make a finding that such change or increase is reasonable and in the public interest.

summary.text: Requires, under the Rail Passenger Service Act of 1970, that before the National Railroad Passenger Corporation changes any schedule of, or increases any rate, fare, or charge for, rail passenger service, the Corporation shall hold a public hearing and make a finding that such change or increase is reasonable and in the public interest.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Rail Passenger Service Act of 1970 in order to require that before the National Railroad Passenger Corporation changes any schedule of, or increases any rate, fare, or charge for, rail passenger service, the Corporation shall hold a public hearing and make a finding that such change or increase is reasonable and in the public interest.
